name: Z-Hydraulic Vice
effect: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the Foe. Inflicts 3 Typeless Damage every turn for 4 turns. Blocks user and makes all attacks targeting them unable to fail for the duration of the effect. Effect immediately ends if user faints.
description: A brutal move where the user bites down on the target and absolutely refuses to let go, vibrating their metal teeth at a frequency that devastates the target continuously. However, remaining so close to an opponent has it's downsides...
